Working Projects.Name: Branches
Working Projects.Description: This is an older recreation I did of a Mr. Doob project. The branches are created where the user clicks and each branch only lasts a set amount of time.

Working Projects.Name: Bezier Curve
Working Projects.Description: The Bezier Curve allows an object to follow a set path based on the positioning of anchor points that adjust the movement style of the object.

Working Projects.Name: Basics
Working Projects.Description: This is the page I designated for basic projects to be developed. Such projects may include, but not limited to: Random Number Generator, Calculator, Read/Write Data

Working Projects.Name: Explanation
Working Projects.Description: This page is used to explain each of my projects in a consolidated place. I plan for this data to always be dynamically created/updated making use of fetch requests. Currently it is simply setup to read a JSON file, but focusing on SQL later on may be more beneficial.

Developing Projects.Name: Popcorn
Developing Projects.Description: This game makes use of the Bezier Curve (at least initially did), and focuses on user reaction speed and time to click on seeds that pop up. When a seed is clicked on, it will turn to popcorn.

Developing Projects.Name: Dice
Developing Projects.Description: This is currently just a simple die that can be 'rolled' as many times as desired and will always give a random value between 1-6

Project Ideas.Name: Hangman
Project Ideas.Description: This is already created and in one of my github repos, but it would need fine tuning in the styling.

Project Ideas.Name: Calculator
Project Ideas.Description: I plan for this to be a simple calculator that can take in digits, do simple calculations, then display them. I don't plan going as far to make this a graphing calculator or anything near, but simple calculations are easy.

Project Ideas.Name: Ball Pit
Project Ideas.Description: I'm not entirely sure if it would be a ball pit or a bouncing ball game, but I do know I want to make bouncy balls and they aren't as difficult as I initially thought from what I've seen.
